product.name: iPhone 16
product.description: Experience the future of mobile technology with the all-new iPhone 16. Designed for power, performance, and style, this stunning Blue variant blends sleek aesthetics with cutting-edge innovation. With an advanced chipset, enhanced camera system, and immersive display, the iPhone 16 ensures smooth multitasking, vibrant visuals, and crystal-clear photos and videos. Whether you're capturing memories or managing your day-to-day tasks, the iPhone 16 delivers it all with elegance and speed.

product.name: Samsung Galaxy S24
product.description: Introducing the Samsung Galaxy S24 â€“ a perfect fusion of performance and elegance. Wrapped in a sleek Phantom Black finish, this premium smartphone features a lightning-fast processor, pro-grade camera setup, and a brilliant AMOLED display. Whether you're gaming, streaming, or snapping high-resolution photos, the Galaxy S24 delivers an exceptional experience that keeps you ahead of the curve.

product.name: Dell XPS 15
product.description: Power meets precision with the Dell XPS 15, crafted for creators, professionals, and tech enthusiasts. Housed in a sleek Platinum Silver chassis, this laptop boasts a stunning 15.6-inch InfinityEdge display, powerful Intel Core processor, and ultra-fast SSD storage. Whether you're editing 4K videos or multitasking across intensive applications, the XPS 15 delivers seamless performance with style.

product.name: Apple iPad Air (5th Gen)
product.description: Experience power in a portable form with the Apple iPad Air (5th Gen). Featuring the blazing-fast M1 chip, a vibrant Liquid Retina display, and seamless Apple Pencil compatibility, it's the perfect device for both creativity and productivity on the go.

product.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6
product.description: Stay connected and track your health with the stylish Samsung Galaxy Watch 6. Equipped with advanced fitness tracking, heart monitoring, and a vibrant AMOLED display, this Graphite beauty keeps you informed and on the move all day long.

product.name: Sony WH-1000XM5
product.description: Immerse yourself in superior sound with the Sony WH-1000XM5 noise-canceling headphones. Featuring crystal-clear audio, adaptive sound control, and long-lasting battery life, these sleek Midnight Black headphones are perfect for travel, work, or pure relaxation.
